# VaultLock Landing Page

This is a Next.js 14+ project for the VaultLock password manager landing page.

## Tech Stack
- **Framework:** Next.js 14+ with App Router
- **Language:** TypeScript
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS with custom theme
- **Animations:** Framer Motion
- **Icons:** Lucide React

## Project Structure
- `src/app/` - Next.js app router pages
- `src/components/` - React components
- `src/app/globals.css` - Global styles and Tailwind configuration

## Brand Colors
- Primary: #3E4AFF (Blue-Purple)
- Secondary: #4CC9B0 (Teal)
- Accent: #5C9DFF (Light Blue)
- Dark Background: #0F0F14
- Dark Surface: #18181F

## Code Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all new files
- Follow the existing component patterns with Framer Motion animations
- Use Tailwind CSS utility classes
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Use the custom colors defined in tailwind.config.ts

## Running the Project
```bash
npm install
npm run dev
```
